Project by Tony & Ing

How does it work

  • Similar to gather town
  • Tile-based virtual museum
  • Each class is divided into different topics

Topics to learn about in the museum

  • Positive psychology
  • How does exercise affect your wellbeing
  • How to incorporate your hobbies into your daily life in  order to find happiness and meaning
  • How mental and physical health connected

How to play

Each of the topics are divided into different chapters and classes, attend these online classes with npcs to learn more about your selected topic.

CLASSROOM: Positive Psychology

RESEARCH LAB: Hobbies, exercise and Mental health

How we Got our Ideas

  • Common theme
  • Incorporating happiness and meaning with different parts of a human life
  • Making an entertaining way to present this information
